title: Glory To His Name
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: Down at the cross where my Savior died,
Down where for cleansing from sin I cried,
There to my sin was the blood applied;
v2: I am so wondrously saved from sin,
There at the cross where He took me in;
v3: Oh, precious fountain that saves from sin,
I am so glad I have entered in;
There Jesus saves me and keeps me clean;
v4: Come to this fountain so rich and sweet;
Cast thy poor soul at the Savior's feet;
Plunge in today, and be made complete;
c1: Glory to His name, Glory to His name;
There to my sin was the blood applied;
